text: Esterzili (Istersìli, Stersìli) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 643 people lived there. Its area is 100.74 km². It is 731 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Esterzili
